channel.title: Need help with jar archive!
channel.description:
Ok, well so far I have created a java exe archive which is a compliation of all my classes within my client directory, but the toruble is, when i run the exe file i get the "could not find main class" error. help please! bare in mind this is towards making a web client. thanks.
It may have something to do with the Mani fest..which I do not have in the client folder..??? =/ Please help.

item.title: Need help with jar archive!
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

Ok, well so far I have created a java exe archive which is a compliation of all my classes within my client directory, but the toruble is, when i run the exe file i get the “could not find main class” error. help please! bare in mind this is towards making a web client. thanks.

It may have something to do with the Mani fest…which I do not have in the client folder…??? =/ Please help.
